verses.verse: Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord,<WH3068> for He is good;<WH2896> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Oh<WH4994> let Israel<WH3478> say,<WH559> "His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>"
Oh<WH4994> let the house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175> say,<WH559> "His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>"
Oh<WH4994> let those who fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> say,<WH559> "His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>"
From [my] distress<WH4712> I called<WH7121> upon the Lord;<WH3050> The Lord<WH3050> answered<WH6030> me [and set me] in a large<WH4800> place.<WH4800>
The Lord<WH3068> is for me; I will not fear;<WH3372> What<WH4100> can man<WH120> do<WH6213> to me?
The Lord<WH3068> is for me among those who help<WH5826> me; Therefore I shall look<WH7200> [with satisfaction] on those who hate<WH8130> me.
It is better<WH2896> to take<WH2620> refuge<WH2620> in the Lord<WH3068> Than<WH4480> to trust<WH982> in man.<WH120>
It is better<WH2896> to take<WH2620> refuge<WH2620> in the Lord<WH3068> Than<WH4480> to trust<WH982> in princes.<WH5081>
All<WH3605> nations<WH1471> surrounded<WH5437> me; In the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> I will surely<WH3588> cut<WH4135> them off.<WH4135>
They surrounded<WH5437> me, yes,<WH1571> they surrounded<WH5437> me; In the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> I will surely<WH3588> cut<WH4135> them off.<WH4135>

They surrounded<WH5437> me like bees;<WH1682> They were extinguished<WH1846> as a fire<WH784> of thorns;<WH6975> In the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> I will surely<WH3588> cut<WH4135> them off.<WH4135>
You pushed<WH1760> me violently<WH1760> so that I was falling,<WH5307> But the Lord<WH3068> helped<WH5826> me.
The Lord<WH3050> is my strength<WH5797> and song,<WH2172> And He has become<WH1961> my salvation.<WH3444>

The sound<WH6963> of joyful<WH7440> shouting<WH7440> and salvation<WH3444> is in the tents<WH168> of the righteous;<WH6662> The right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> of the Lord<WH3068> does<WH6213> valiantly.<WH2428>
The right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> of the Lord<WH3068> is exalted;<WH7311> The right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> of the Lord<WH3068> does<WH6213> valiantly.<WH2428>
I shall not die,<WH4191> but live,<WH2421> And tell<WH5608> of the works<WH4639> of the Lord.<WH3050>
The Lord<WH3050> has disciplined<WH3256> me severely,<WH3256> But He has not given<WH5414> me over to death.<WH4194>
Open<WH6605> to me the gates<WH8179> of righteousness;<WH6664> I shall enter<WH935> through them, I shall give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord.<WH3050>
This<WH2088> is the gate<WH8179> of the Lord;<WH3068> The righteous<WH6662> will enter<WH935> through it.
I shall give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thee, for Thou hast answered<WH6030> me; And Thou hast become<WH1961> my salvation.<WH3444>
The stone<WH68> which the builders<WH1129> rejected<WH3988> Has become<WH1961> the chief<WH7218> corner<WH6438> [stone.]
This<WH384> is the Lord's doing<WH4480>;<WH854> It is marvelous<WH6381> in our eyes.<WH5869>
This<WH2088> is the day<WH3117> which the Lord<WH3068> has made;<WH6213> Let us rejoice<WH1523> and be glad<WH8055> in it.
O<WH577> Lord,<WH3068> do save,<WH3467> we beseech<WH577> Thee; O<WH577> Lord,<WH3068> we beseech<WH577> Thee, do send<WH6743> prosperity!<WH6743>
Blessed<WH1288> is the one who comes<WH935> in the name<WH8034> of the Lord;<WH3068> We have blessed<WH1288> you from the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>
The Lord<WH3068> is God,<WH410> and He has given<WH215> us light;<WH215> Bind<WH631> the festival<WH2282> sacrifice<WH2282> with cords<WH5688> to the horns<WH7161> of the altar.<WH4196>
Thou art my God,<WH410> and I give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thee; [Thou art] my God,<WH430> I extol<WH7311> Thee.
Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord,<WH3068> for He is good;<WH2896> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
